name: Joan Matias Dominguez

education.title: High School Diploma
education.description: Education focused on exact sciences, developing logical thinking and analytical skills applicable to software development.

professionalAboutMe: Frontend Developer specialized in React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Experience in developing responsive interfaces with TailwindCSS and integration with Supabase. Solid knowledge in testing with Vitest to ensure robust and reliable code. Focus on maintainable, scalable, and user-experience-centered code.
largeAboutMe: My first 'Hello world' was the blinking LED of an Arduino, and since then I've dedicated over 1.5 years to transforming ideas into digital experiences that people enjoy using.
I share Steve Jobs' idea that 'design is not just how it looks, but how it works,' and I like finding that point where technology feels magical but never complicated.
I believe the web should be accessible to everyone, not just technically, but in how it feels to use it.
I value every detail because I know it's those small things that make the difference between something that works and something that's a joy to use.
shortAboutMe: +1.5 years of experience contributing to the web. Web Developer ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡º specialized in creating experiences that not only work but feel incredible.
marketingAboutMe: Over 1.5 years contributing to the web have taught me that good development isn't measured only in code, but in the experience it creates.
I am a Web Developer specialized in building that for you: the platform that showcases your work, attracts clients, and operates without you worrying about the technology.
From an impactful landing page to a complete online store, I build solutions that not only work but feel incredible and are ready to grow with your business.
